ModMetaData.name: RimFactory Neceros Patch (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Neceros
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Neceros mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2189947027
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://dsc.gg/mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/RimFactoryNecerosPatch][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/Be8E2qJ.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] Adds large underground vaults for [i]Project RimFactory[/i].
[h1]The vaults[/h1] [b]Small underground vault[/b] stores 512 items [img]https://i.imgur.com/dKIWd7c.png[/img]
[b]Underground vault[/b] stores 1,024 items [img]https://i.imgur.com/nJ9Ns9u.png[/img]
[i]MIT License; Copyright (c) 2020 Billy J Barnes[/i] [img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] or the standalone [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2873415404]Uploader[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [*] Use [url=https://github.com/RimSort/RimSort/releases/latest]RimSort[/url] to sort your mods [/list]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/2862241497][img]https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/emipa606/RimFactoryNecerosPatch?label=latest%20version&style=plastic&color=9f1111&labelColor=black[/img][/url]
